On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Joe

 Herald Square

⏲ 10:40 p.m. on Wednesday, January 15

What are you doing today?

Ice skating, then going to Nelson A. Rockefeller Park, then watching a movie. Sort of a good Wednesday. I took off work today, so it should be eventful.

What's your favorite part of the day?

Probably getting home. It’s relaxing. Usually I try to book my days. So I usually go to work and then the gym, maybe meet up with buddies and then just head home. That’s the best part of the day.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Also taking off work. My girlfriend is still in school. This is her last week, so I’m just trying to spend all my time with her. I have the next few months to just work my ass of, so that’s what I’ll do.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
